name: Nexus Day Rover (Tyne & Wear)
description:
NEXUS DAY ROVER Unlimited travel for one day throughout the whole of Tyne & Wear on Metro trains, buses and on Northern services between Blaydon, Newcastle and Sunderland and the 
      Shields Ferry. Other tickets are available for travel throughout Tyne & Wear see their website for details
